name: The Calamitous Raider
description:
A short game about the misadventures of a cave raider. If you can share your first ending, that would be really cool. 

1. It's a bit difficult to describe the structure of this games story, primarily because it's pretty open-ended. There is no back story other than the main character being a cave raider. 

2. I decided to make the story in this way because I thought if I set up a more linear narrative, it would limit some of the outcomes I put in the story. In other words, I wanted to set it up in such a way that anything was possible, and the outcome of the story would solely rely on the player's choices.
